properties.entry: INSERT INTO PETLOG ( PETLOG_NO , MEM_NO , PETLOG_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_PETLOGNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , REF_BOARD_NO , REF_NO , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 6 , SEQ_PETLOGNO.CURRVAL , ? )
SELECT PETLOG_NO , MEM_NO , ENROLL_DATE , PETLOG_CONTENT , ROOM_NAME FROM PETLOG JOIN PETSROOM USING (MEM_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
